subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A little short on pepperoni, the Giro d'Italia sets off Saturday in Amsterdam to open the season of major bicycle stage races amid a heap of problems.
snippet: A little short on pepperoni, the Giro d'Italia sets off Saturday in Amsterdam to open the season of major bicycle stage races amid a heap of problems.
